meanings.definition: A small, relatively unimportant offense or sin.
meanings.sent1: Her forgetting to return the library book on time was just a peccadillo.
meanings.sent2: Leaving the lights on all night is a common peccadillo in our household.
meanings.sent3: His peccadillo of always misplacing his keys never fails to make us chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The peccadillo of sneaking extra cookies before dinner was his guilty pleasure.
meanings.sent5: The peccadillo of telling white lies caught up with her in the end.

meanings.sent1: His constant tardiness was seen as a peccadillo by his friends.
meanings.sent2: Forgetting birthdays is a peccadillo she is working on improving.
meanings.sent3: Her peccadillo of always mixing up similar-sounding words led to some funny misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: The peccadillo of leaving the cap off the toothpaste tube annoyed his roommate.
meanings.sent5: The peccadillo of biting her nails made her feel self-conscious.
